DIA_Castaway_ThisIsMyIsland_03_01: What the hell are you doing on my island!?
DIA_Castaway_ThisIsMyIsland_03_02: Are you trying to rob me? Or assault?
DIA_Castaway_ThisIsMyIsland_03_04: Hey, listen, you have to compensate me somehow for my nerves!
DIA_Castaway_ThisIsMyIsland_03_05: Otherwise, get ready to get spanked!
DIA_Castaway_YouGetNothing_03_02: I'm sorry, but you're asking for it!
DIA_Castaway_Money_15_01: How much gold do you want?
DIA_Castaway_Money_03_02: Gold? What do I need gold for, boy?
DIA_Castaway_Money_03_03: Let's do it another way! Bring me six raw fish.
DIA_Castaway_Money_03_04: That will be payment enough for me.
DIA_Castaway_Fish_03_02: There you go, that wasn't hard, was it?
DIA_Castaway_Fish_03_03: Hmm, you know, maybe I reacted a little too aggressively to your arrival.
DIA_Castaway_Fish_03_04: I don't get a lot of visitors... If you want, you can come and see me sometimes.
DIA_Castaway_Fish_03_06: I think those fish are invisible, or you got something wrong.
DIA_Castaway_Fish_03_08: It was supposed to be six!
DIA_Castaway_HowAreYou_03_03: Oh, and I have something for you!
